DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate potential effect multiple dose neratinib pharmacokinetics ( body absorbs , distributes , metabolize and/or excretes ) single dose digoxin .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Potential Effect Of Multiple Doses Of Neratinib On The Pharmacokinetics Of A Single Dose Of Digoxin
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy men woman nonchildbearing potential , age 1850
